mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYQ (NAME, CONTENT, IMAGE, MEMBER_ID, EMAIL_SEND, QUESTION_DATE) VALUES (#{name}, #{content}, #{image}, #{memberId}, #{emailSend}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY QUESTION_DATE DESC) as RN, I.* FROM MYQ I WHERE ANSWER IS NULL ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 and 10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY QUESTION_DATE DESC) as RN, I.* FROM MYQ I WHERE ANSWER IS NOT NULL ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 and 10
SELECT EMAIL_SEND FROM MYQ WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE MYQ SET ANSWER_DATE=SYSDATE, ANSWER=#{answer}, ANSWER_TITLE=#{answerTitle} WHERE IDX=#{idx}
